pullRequest.title: Generalize Miner Server's extra data tests
pullRequest.bodyText:
Miner Server tests relating to the extraData field would break when executing on a non-SNAPSHOT version.
The aim of this PR is to generalize these tests to work under any of the configured test configurations.

beforeCommit.message: Make the MinerServer's extraData tests adaptable to each parameterized test configurations and versions instead of relying on a hardcoded SNAPSHOT

afterCommit.message: Make the MinerServer's extraData tests adaptable to each parameterized test configurations and versions instead of relying on a hardcoded SNAPSHOT

commit.message: Override projectVersionModifier for each configuration defined in ParameterizedNetworkUpgradeTest
Make the MinerServer's extraData tests adaptable to each parameterized test configurations and versions instead of relying on a hardcoded SNAPSHOT
